description: Steel cable draws for hanging on project routes or difficult-to-clip bolts. Designed for indoor climbing. They can be used outdoors, but must be inspected regularly for wear and corrosion. Fitted with polyurethane tubing for comfort and grip (for those of us who sometimes grab draws).Zinc-plated, steel-alloy carabiner.Bent aluminum gate.Cable is 7 x 19 galvanized aircraft cable.Quicklinks are zinc-plated steel alloy.
name: Climbtech Perma Draw Cable Quickdraw Set
